description: A Dart script demonstrating the creation, mapping, and formatting of a Note object, including conversion to and from a Map, and displaying formatted update time.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Model representing a Note with attributes such as title, content, color, and timestamp.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the script demonstrating Note creation, mapping, restoring, and formatted timestamp output.

methods.name: Note.newNote
methods.description: Constructor method to create a new Note with specified title and content.

methods.name: Note.toMap
methods.description: Converts a Note object to a Map representation.

methods.name: Note.fromMap
methods.description: Restores a Note object from its Map representation.

methods.name: DateFormatUtils.showFullDateTime
methods.description: Formats a DateTime object into a full date-time string.
